DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unique identifier for a positive observation confirming a positive clincial finding.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An imaging observation confirming a positive clincial finding.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Property.preferredDefinition:
An observation confirming something, such as the
presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/31/12 jc  Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor. remove modality (ultrasound) from concepts.   3/21/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task; 3/25/07 jc updated for EVS term recommendation.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A unique identifier for identifying a positive lesion finding.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:The result of an examination or inquiry.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
The result of an examination or inquiry.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/31/12 jc Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor; removed text as qualifier.  3/20/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Lesion# U [format= UR1, UR2,
ReferenceDocuments.description: Lesion# U [format= UR1, UR2, UR3, etc.]

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/14/13 Removed caBIG-ACRIN Breast Ultrasound CSI; added equivalent modality and Under Review ECOG-ACRIN CSI. jc   10/31/12 Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor. jc  3/26/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.
